Test.Name: Correct response: one recording job
Test.Description: Check GET RECORDING JOB STATE test when DUT sends correct response with one recording job

Test.Name: Correct response: no optional Source parameter
Test.Description: Check GET RECORDING JOB STATE test when DUT sends correct response with one recording job

Test.Name: Correct response: several recording jobs
Test.Description: Check GET RECORDING JOB STATE test when DUT sends correct response with several recording jobs

Test.Name: Correct response: no recording jobs
Test.Description: Check GET RECORDING JOB STATE test when DUT sends correct response with no recording jobs

Test.Name: Correct response: no recordings
Test.Description: Check GET RECORDING JOB STATE test when DUT sends correct response with no recordings

Test.Name: Incorrect response: not existing RecordingToken
Test.Description: Check GET RECORDING JOB STATE test when DUT sends correct response with not existing RecordingToken

Test.Name: Incorrect response: different SourceToken
Test.Description: Check GET RECORDING JOB STATE test when DUT sends incorrect response with different SourceToken

Test.Name: Incorrect response: different source type
Test.Description: Check GET RECORDING JOB STATE test when DUT sends incorrect response different source type

Test.Name: Incorrect response: different SourceTag
Test.Description: Check GET RECORDING JOB STATE test when DUT sends incorrect response with different SourceTag

Test.Name: Incorrect response: different Destination
Test.Description: Check GET RECORDING JOB STATE test when DUT sends incorrect response with different Destination

Test.Name: Incorrect response: different Source lists
Test.Description: Check GET RECORDING JOB STATE test when DUT sends incorrect response: not all State.Sources items from GetRecordingJobStateResponse message are contained in JobItem.JobConfiguration.Source items from GetRecordingJobsResponse message

Test.Name: Incorrect response: different Track lists
Test.Description: Check GET RECORDING JOB STATE test when DUT sends incorrect response not all Track items from GetRecordingJobStateResponse message are contained in Track items from GetRecordingJobsResponse message

Test.Name: No Response
Test.Description: Check GET RECORDING JOB STATE test when DUT sends no response

Test.Name: Fault
Test.Description: Check GET RECORDING JOB STATE test when DUT sends fault

Test.Name: Correct response: no optional parameter Tracks.Trac.Error
Test.Description: Check GET RECORDING JOB STATE test when DUT sends correct GetRecordingJobState response with no optional parameter Tracks.Trac.Error
